content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the integral from 0 to 3 x, of, e raised to the t squared power, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="e raised to the x squared power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="e raised to the 9 times x squared power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="3 times, e raised to the 9 times x squared power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="18 x times, e raised to the 9 times x squared power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>18</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></math>
